subject: Indianapolis 500 (Auto Race)
Automobile Racing
lead_paragraph: Roger Penske has a chance to complete a one-of-a-kind double, adding a centennial celebration victory at Indianapolis to the 50th anniversary win at Daytona.
snippet: Roger Penske has a chance to complete a one-of-a-kind double, adding a centennial celebration victory at Indianapolis to the 50th anniversary win at Daytona.
